N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5321.6 - Off-premises storage

State Regulations
(a) A
gaming facility licensee shall not store gaming devices off the premises of a
licensed facility without prior approval from the commission. (b) A gaming facility licensee seeking to
store gaming devices off the premises of a licensed facility shall submit a
written request to the commission for off-premise storage. Such written request
shall include: (1)
the location and a
physical description of the proposed storage facility; (2)
a description of the type of surveillance
system that has been or will be installed at the proposed storage
facility; (3)
the plan to provide
24-hour surveillance; (4)
the
anticipated number of gaming devices that may be stored at the proposed storage
facility; and
(5)
the
manufacturer's serial number of each machine. (c) Before the commission approves a request
for off-premise storage of gaming devices, the commission may request to
inspect the proposed storage facility. (d) The commission shall approve or
disapprove requests within 60 days. Approvals by the commission may be subject
to specific terms and conditions. Notes
